name: PopToonPark
description:
Enjoy this 3D balloon popping, bubble bursting children's game that takes place in a vibrant cartoon park. The object of the game is to pop all of the released balloons and bubbles before they disappear into the dusk sky. There are three scored scenarios that include a plane, bubble machine, and blimp.

How to Play:

-Tap or swipe finger on the screen to pop visible balloons and bubbles.

Sound Effects:

- Cartoon theme (entire game);
- Balloons popping;
- Bubbles popping;
- Puppy barking;
- Ducks quaking;
- Plane skid.

Visit website: immersivekid.com to send feedback and suggestions about this game.
